content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

  • SEA FREIGHT
    MORE PERFORMANCE - MORE SUCCESS

    Thanks to arrangements with reliable shipping companies and a worldwide network of agents, Monnard is the perfect partner to entrust your maritime shipments with.

    Read more:

  • ROAD FREIGHT
    MORE PERFORMANCE - MORE SUCCESS

    Full loads or consolidated freight, ranging from ADR to fabrics or the most delicate glassware … at Monnard we pick the most appropriate mode of transportation.

    Read more:

  • AIR FREIGHT
    MORE PERFORMANCE - MORE SUCCESS

    Monnard provides punctual and dedicated air transportation. We book your cargo on to the first available flight.

    Read more:

  • VALUE-ADDED SERVICES
    MORE PERFORMANCE - MORE SUCCESS

    24 hours a day we provide a complete service package, value added logistics included. Furthermore you can always count on our know-how for an efficient, fully documented treatment.

    Read more:

  • MONNARD PROJECTS
    MORE PERFORMANCE - MORE SUCCESS

    Maintain and reinforce the satisfaction of your customers… pay attention to your core business. Monnard will take care of your transports. We are glad to assist you.

    Read more:

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”base_bg_color_light no_overflow_hidden” css=”.vc_custom_1476869586842{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner el_class=”hide-respo”][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1573206791707{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sea Freight · Road Transport · Air Freight ·
Worldwide Project Logistics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1573206797832{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]For 135 year the forwarder Monnard has participated in the increasing complexity of global logistics. Here we combine the professionalism of a modern logistics company with the virtue and values of a family enterprise and so are highly successful in defending our market position.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]With the help of our partners at many important trading places we jointly develop customized solutions with our customers because today a consignment of any size, kind or weight can be delivered to any destination and we provide the suitable product for this.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1481793808604{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #e2e2e2 !important;}” el_class=”base_bg_color”][vc_column][stm_services posts_per_page=”12″ autoplay=”yes” items_tablet=”3″ items_normal=”” items_small=””]

Special Services

Because we are a member of an international investor network, we have the financial and logistical resources to define and achieve our customers’ goals, while supporting them all along the way.[/stm_services][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1476789252610{margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;background-color: vc_col-md-6″][vc_custom_heading text=”What makes us special?” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]MONNARD gets your goods where they need to be, when they need to be there, in the most efficient way     Phone: +49 (0)421/ 322 65-0
    E-Mail: carsten.borchardt@monnard.com

    When contacting us, you agree that your data will be processed. Click here to read the privacy policy.


    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1536926223788{padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #e8e8e8 !important;}” el_class=”meganavihome hide-mobile”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1536924819697{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]

    OUR GROUP OF COMPANIES
